heroSection.title: AI for coops from coops!
heroSection.subtitle: Exploring how AI can empower cooperativism. Using technology to address real-world cooperative challenges while embracing the movement principles.

projects.title: Experiences
projects.subtitle: Real-world applications of our AI solutions

projects.title: Optimizing Quality Control in Manufacturing
projects.description: We developed an AI-powered system for a manufacturing client to enhance quality control. It processes 16 images per second with 99.99% accuracy, identifying defects in real-time. This solution helps workers reduce errors and minimize waste, ensuring high-quality products.

projects.title: Satellite-Based Insights for Agriculture
projects.description: We created a system that analyzes satellite imagery and field data across 60,000 hectares. It provides daily insights, enabling smarter decisions for crop management. This tool supports agricultural cooperatives in achieving higher yields and better resource allocation.

projects.title: Automating Data Extraction from Printed Documents
projects.description: We built an AI solution for a client to automate data extraction from printed documents. The system captures and digitizes key information, reducing manual effort and errors. This ensures seamless integration with the cooperative's digital systems, enhancing overall productivity.

projects.title: Big Data Solution
projects.description: We implemented a Big Data platform to analyze large volumes of operational data. The system provides actionable insights, helping staff make informed decisions and optimize resource allocation.

projects.title: Demand Forecasting for Logistics
projects.description: We implemented a predictive AI system for a logistics client to forecast demand and optimize delivery routes. By analyzing historical data and real-time variables, the system helps reduce costs, improve delivery times, and ensure efficient resource allocation.

about.title: What we are doing

keyPoints.title: IA from a cooperative view
keyPoints.description: We create custom AI tools that adapt to your cooperative's needs. Whether it's automating repetitive tasks or improving decision-making, our goal is to make your work easier and more efficient.

keyPoints.title: Human-Centered approach
keyPoints.description: Our solutions are designed to work alongside your team, not replace them. We focus on creating tools that help people do their jobs better, faster, and with less stress.

keyPoints.title: Collaborative Innovation
keyPoints.description: We believe in the power of working together. By sharing knowledge and tools, we help cooperatives build stronger networks and achieve more as a community.

about.mainText: As technological cooperatives, we develop artificial intelligence solutions tailored to the needs of cooperatives. We work closely with each cooperative to understand their unique processes, challenges, and goals. By observing and analyzing how they operate, we co-create custom AI solutions that fit their needs. Together, we identify opportunities to enhance workflows, improve efficiency, and empower workers with technology to solve real-world problems and strengthen communities.

aboutHow.title: From vision to collective impact
aboutHow.subtitle: A collaborative approach to implementing AI. We don‚Äôt impose solutions ‚Äî we work alongside each cooperative to understand its challenges and identify concrete opportunities where AI can add real value. From diagnosis to development and implementation, we design tailored tools with an ethical, open, and sustainable approach. For us, AI is a process of collective creation.

phases.title: #1 | Exploration Phase
phases.description: During this phase, we immerse ourselves in the cooperative's daily operations to identify opportunities where AI can drive real improvements. We engage with the team, observe workflows, and identify key challenges. We focus on finding bottlenecks like inefficiencies, high costs, or repetitive tasks. Based on this analysis, we propose AI-driven solutions to address these issues.

keyPoints.title: Choosing the priority solution:
keyPoints.description: We collaborate with your team to select the AI solution that best fits your needs and priorities.

keyPoints.title: Building the MVP
keyPoints.description: Next, we develop a Minimum Viable Product (MVP)‚Äîa simplified but functional version of the chosen solution.

keyPoints.title: Performance testing
keyPoints.description: We test it in a controlled environment to ensure the core features work as expected. Through multiple iterations, we gather feedback, refine the tool, and strengthen its functionality.

phases.title: #3 | Production Phase
phases.description: In this phase, we take the validated solution and refine it for full-scale implementation. This includes integrating it into your day-to-day operations, testing it in a live environment, and analyzing its impact by comparing performance metrics before and after implementation. Based on the results, we plan next steps to address additional challenges.

whoWeAre.title: Who we are
whoWeAre.subtitle: As technology cooperatives organized through FACTTIC (Argentina‚Äôs federation of tech co-ops), we‚Äôve spent over a decade building digital solutions with a social purpose. We‚Äôve seen how cooperatives, despite their potential, often fall behind in adopting new technologies. That‚Äôs why we‚Äôve come together as a network of tech cooperatives‚Äîto bridge that gap. As cooperatives ourselves, we understand the challenges cooperatives face because, in many ways, we speak the same language. We believe in the power of teamwork and interdisciplinary collaboration, and we‚Äôre committed to making a difference by developing technology that truly serves cooperatives. Our focus is on democratizing artificial intelligence, making it accessible and a driver of sustainable growth for cooperatives. If you‚Äôre a tech cooperative working with AI and would like to join us, we‚Äôd love to hear from you!

lawal.name: Lawal
lawal.description: Tech cooperative specializing in AI solutions

services.title: Unlocking the power of AI for cooperatives
services.subtitle: Using AI Tools for a stronger cooperative future

service1.title: Seeing what matters with Computer Vision
service1.description: It allows machines to interpret images or videos. We use this technology to automate tasks like quality control (e.g., identifying defects in products), object recognition (e.g., sorting items in a warehouse), and security monitoring (e.g., detecting anomalies in real-time). It‚Äôs ideal for cooperatives that handle visual data and need to streamline processes.

service2.title: Strategic forecasting
service2.description: Prediction models use historical data to anticipate future events. For cooperatives, this means forecasting demand (e.g., predicting how much of a product will be needed), optimizing resources (e.g., planning inventory or workforce), and reducing risks (e.g., anticipating market changes). It‚Äôs a powerful tool for making data-driven decisions.

service3.title: Streamlining text workflows with Large Language Models (LLMs)
service3.description: Large language models can understand and generate human-like text. We use them to improve customer service (e.g., chatbots that answer questions instantly), automate document processing (e.g., extracting key information from contracts), and assist with content creation (e.g., generating reports or summaries). It‚Äôs perfect for cooperatives that deal with large volumes of text.

service4.title: Unlocking data potential with Big Data
service4.description: Big data tools help manage and analyze large datasets that are too complex for traditional methods. For cooperatives, this means identifying trends (e.g., understanding customer behavior), optimizing operations (e.g., finding inefficiencies in workflows), and making strategic decisions (e.g., based on real-time data). It‚Äôs essential for cooperatives that generate or rely on large amounts of data.

service5.title: AI Tools Capacitation for Your Team
service5.description: We can teach your team (IT or other departments) how to use existing AI tools in a performatic way and avoid spending more time asking chat agents to do something that could be done more efficiently. Our training focuses on practical skills and best practices for AI tool integration in your cooperative's workflow.
